Package game

Class Door

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.StaticBody
game.Doorway
game.Door
public class Door extends Doorway
Represents a door in the game that can be interacted with by the player.

This class extends Doorway and configures a specific type of door using a box shape. It includes visual representation through an image and has associated sound effects that play when the door is destroyed. The sound effect signifies the door opening or being interacted with.

Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Door

      public Door(city.cs.engine.World world)
      Constructs a new door object within the specified game world.

      This constructor initializes the door with a rectangular box shape and an associated image. The door's physical and visual properties are set here, including its size and the image scale.

      Parameters:
      world - The game world where this door will exist.

  • Method Details

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Destroys the door and plays a sound effect.

      Overrides the destroy method to include playing a sound effect when the door is destroyed, which can be used to signify the door being opened or broken down.

      Overrides:
      destroy in class city.cs.engine.Body
